======Makes drones use lower poly models.======

= Description =

Makes drones use lower-poly (7000 polys) models rather than the high poly (14000 polys) ones. Useful if you're spawning a lot of aliens and don't want to lag clients too much. Automagically disables <!--[asw_drone_bones]-->[[asw_drone_bones.wiki|asw_drone_bones]].
